plot outline: A bus driver Shankra, along with his conductor Dharma, assembles a transport facility from Hyderabad to Bangalore city. On their way, they face various problems to reach the destiny. Together they must overcome them to drop the passenger to their intended destination.
title: Prayanikara Gamanakke
plot: A bus driver Shankra, along with his conductor Dharma, assembles a transport facility from Hyderabad to Bangalore city. On their way, they face various problems to reach the destiny. Together they must overcome them to drop the passenger to their intended destination.::BookMyShow
